meanings.definition: a surgical operation for delivering a baby by cutting through the walls of the abdomen and uterus.
meanings.sent1: Many mothers opt for cesarians when natural birth is not possible.
meanings.sent2: The doctor performed a cesarians on the expectant mother.
meanings.sent3: The hospital had a special room just for cesarians, decorated with calming colors.
meanings.sent4: The miracle of cesarians brings new life into the world through careful incisions.
meanings.sent5: The success rate of cesarians has increased over the years, ensuring safer deliveries.

meanings.definition: relating to or denoting a cesarean section.
meanings.sent1: The cesarians procedure requires a skilled surgical team.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had a dedicated cesarians unit for expectant mothers.
meanings.sent3: The doctor's cesarians jokes lightened the mood in the delivery room.
meanings.sent4: Her cesarians scar was a reminder of the life-saving procedure she underwent.
meanings.sent5: The cesarians recovery period is crucial for the mother's well-being after childbirth.
